grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 肝【キモ】liver, innards, courage, spirit, pluck, guts, crux, essential point
魂胆【コンタン】ulterior motive, plot, scheme, complicated circumstances, intricacies
剛胆【ゴウタン】boldness, hardihood, courage, valour, valor
kun reading compounds: 肝【きも】liver, innards, courage, spirit, pluck, guts, crux, essential point
肝いり【きもいり】good offices, auspices, sponsorship, help, assistance, village official (during the Edo period)
